summary: My little homelab is bit different from many others in that I don't have a SAN/NAS or other dedicated storage setup.  This can sometimes make sharing files between systems a little bit tricky.  I've used workarounds like Tailscale Serve for sharing files over HTTP or simply scping files around as needed, but none of those solutions are really very elegant...
title: Taking Taildrive for a Testdrive

title: When did cryptocurrency policy become a voter issue?

summary: Apple has made a lot of partnerships with big companies like Quantum Computer Services (AOL), Microsoft, HP, Intel, Cingular (AT&T), Epic Games, Valve, Capcom, and Ubisoft.  They are all pretty one-sided in terms of who benefits.  Focusing on these partnerships distracts from what has made Apple's platforms  successful: the community of dedicated indie developers...
title: Indie Devs, Not Apple, Made iOS and macOS a Success
